name: cue
description: Experimental generative art using sentiment analysis

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && uv run uvicorn server:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8001 --reload
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.prod: npm run build && npm run deploy:prod
scripts.restart: sudo systemctl restart cue-backend && sudo systemctl reload nginx
